text.div: • Include codes from http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ActCode where concept is-a EM

name: EmergencyPharmacySupplyType
title: EmergencyPharmacySupplyType
description: A supply action where there is no 'valid' order for the supplied medication. E.g. Emergency vacation supply, weekend supply (when prescriber is unavailable to provide a renewal prescription)
